It causes them to multiply and grow.
He'll deal with the multitude of people who hold wrong views.
It causes them to enter the place of faith.
He's dealing with a multitude of people in the midst of situations.
It's because they're made to have pure faith.

source_sentence: 瑜伽論記卷第二十一(之下終)
translation: Commentary on the Yogâcārabhūmi-śāstra, Volume 21 (end of second half)
